metadata.description: Getting Things Done system for Claude Code with GitHub workflow automation, Obsidian integration, and web research capabilities

plugins.name: github
plugins.description: Autonomous GitHub workflow automation with issue planning, code building, review coordination, and merge management

plugins.name: obsidian
plugins.description: Obsidian integration for task management and knowledge capture

plugins.name: web-research
plugins.description: Web research tools for content crawling, analysis, and extraction

plugins.name: docs-management
plugins.description: GitHub project documentation using layered system with literate code awareness

plugins.name: doc-parsing
plugins.description: Parse office documents (pptx, docx, xlsx, pdf, pbix) into repo-friendly artifacts with multi-method extraction

plugins.name: gtd-cc-plugin-dev
plugins.description: Guide for developing Claude Code plugins using gtd-cc architectural patterns - central skills with workflows, thin wrapper commands and agents

plugins.name: random
plugins.description: Miscellaneous productivity and development skills including GTD task management and theme port creation

plugins.name: monorepo-git
plugins.description: Git operations for monorepos with subtree management. Daily development (commit/push) separate from curated subtree publishing.
